title: T206 OFF BACKS NEEDED: Danny Hoffman & George Hunter
author: AndyG

posts.post_title: T206 OFF BACKS NEEDED: Danny Hoffman & George Hunter
posts.post_content:
I am down to my last two cards for my off back binder (also need Monte Cross, but that's not happening). 

Does anyone have a Danny Hoffman and/or a George Hunter IN ANY CONDITION that you would sell or trade? I have cards for trade if that's your preference! Card Pictured for Attention

[IMG]https://vintagecardprices.com/pics/3736/228/212848.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://vintagecardprices.com/pics/3736/216/212838.jpg[/IMG]

Although Andy doesn't post here much, all I can say is he is an A-1 GREAT guy ........ :)

I have done many deals with him over the years, including a BIG one just yesterday ...... ;)


Best wishes on those last two !!

Fun, fun, Scott :rolleyes:

Tolstoi Cross ....................... :eek:
